thread.title: BRIEF-Americas Silver Corp Guidance For 2018 Remains Unchanged At 1.6 Million - 2.0 Million Silver Ounces

title: BRIEF-Americas Silver Corp Guidance For 2018 Remains Unchanged At 1.6 Million - 2.0 Million Silver Ounces
text:
April 17, 2018 / 11:08 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Americas Silver Corp Guidance For 2018 Remains Unchanged At 1.6 Million - 2.0 Million Silver Ounces Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - Americas Silver Corp: 
* ORATION PROVIDES FIRST QUARTER PRODUCTION AND COST UPDATE INCLUDING RECORD LOW CASH COSTS AND ALL-IN SUSTAINING COSTS 
* QTRLY CONSOLIDATED SILVER PRODUCTION OF APPROXIMATELY 400,000 SILVER OUNCES 
* GUIDANCE FOR 2018 REMAINS UNCHANGED AT 1.6 MILLION - 2.0 MILLION SILVER OUNCES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
